_comment: Created by ianb on 03/10/2013 16:41:54 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of patients warned of danger signals on discharge changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of patients not being informed of any danger signals they should watch for upon returning home has remained fairly constant over the last three years at 38%, following a drop from 40% in 2009.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients
